entry.title: Cybercriminals Have Stolen Over $100 Million in NFTs: Report
entry.summary: Thieves looking to score expensive JPEGs have been busy over the last twelve months.

entry.title: Coinbase Announces cbETH Wrapped Ethereum Staking Token
entry.summary: Undeterred by an SEC probe, the exchange launches a new utility token before the merge.

entry.title: Bitboy vs. Atozy: YouTuber Drops Publicly Filed Lawsuit Because It Went Public
entry.summary: "Imagine how thin-skinned you have to be to do this," Atozy says, raising $200,000 for his legal defense.

entry.title: Find an Ethereum Bug Before the Merge? You Could Earn a $1M Reward
entry.summary: The Ethereum Foundation is quadrupling bug bounties ahead of the network’s long-awaited shift to an energy-efficient model.

entry.title: Alameda Research Co-CEO Sam Trabucco Steps Down to 'Relax'
entry.summary: Trabucco is leaving Alameda Research, but admits he “can’t 100% remove” himself from crypto.

entry.title: Professor Republishes Tornado Cash Code Following GitHub Takedown
entry.summary: John Hopkins crypto researcher Matthew Green wants to preserve the code for the sake of academic research and free speech.

entry.title: Ethereum Foundation Confirms Date for Long-Awaited Merge Upgrade
entry.summary: The network’s developers have given dates for when the move to proof of stake will take place.

entry.title: gm: Decentralized Pictures CEO on How Web3 Can Change Hollywood
entry.summary: Decentralized Pictures, the nonprofit co-founded by Roman Coppola, is enabling on-chain voting to greenlight and fund film projects. CEO Leo Matchett tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves how the anti-crypto stigma in Hollywood is fading, how Web3 can bring more diversity to the film world and disrupt the traditional gatekeepers, and how he first got into crypto when he and Coppola set up a Bitcoin miner in an empty sound stage.

entry.title: These Bored Apes Will Melt in Your Mouth: M&M’s Releases NFT-Inspired Candy
entry.summary: A licensing deal between Mars and music label UMG means Bored Ape NFT images are now printed on M&M’s chocolate candies.

entry.title: Despite US Sanctions, Tether Continues To Support Tornado Cash: Report
entry.summary: The stablecoin issuer has yet to receive a request to freeze Tornado Cash-affiliated accounts, but hinted it would comply if it did.

entry.title: Coinstar Moves Beyond Bitcoin, Adding Dogecoin, Ethereum to ATMs
entry.summary: Seven leading digital assets will be available for purchase with cash deposits at 10,000 Coinstar ATMs across the United States.

entry.title: Republican Representative Boebert Failed to Disclose Eight Crypto Trades in 2021
entry.summary: New reports indicate that U.S. Representative Lauren Boebart failed to disclose crypto trades made on Robinhood, violating the STOCK Act.

entry.title: Institutional Investors Are Rediscovering DeFi
entry.summary: Following the first wave of institutional investment in Bitcoin, HNWIs and institutions are exploring the more complex world of decentralized finance.

entry.title: Heather ‘Razzlekhan’ Morgan Breaks Twitter Silence, Denying Links to Crypto, NFT Space
entry.summary: The social personality Razzlekhan was accused of being a co-conspirator to money laundering in the 2016 Bitfinex $4.5 billion hack.

entry.title: Australia’s Financial Watchdog Joins Government in Eyeing Fresh Crypto Regulations
entry.summary: As Australian regulators take a closer look at reigning in cryptocurrencies, federal agencies continue to warn of their risks.

entry.title: Ontario Securities Commission Flags Kucoin, Other Crypto Firms as Unregistered
entry.summary: The OCS is continuing to crack down on unregistered crypto exchanges, warning investors of Kucoin for the second time this August.

entry.title: Singapore Court Greenlights Inquiry Into Three Arrows Capital Finances : Report
entry.summary: 3AC’s liquidators have secured a key court decision to proceed with a further probe into the insolvent crypto hedge fund’s financials.

entry.title: John McAfee Is Still Alive, Ex-Girlfriend Claims In Documentary
entry.summary: In a new Netflix biopic, McAfee’s former partner Samantha Herrera says the notorious software developer faked his death.

entry.title: Coinbase CEO Says Exchange Is Cutting Costs, Focusing on Subscriptions
entry.summary: Brian Armstrong wants Coinbase to shed its “U.S. lens” and be “the most regulated” in crypto.

entry.title: Crypto Lender Celsius Countersues KeyFi for 'Gross Mismanagement'
entry.summary: “The defendants were not just incompetent, they also were thieves," Celsius says.

entry.title: Coinbase Hit With $5M Lawsuit Over Exchange Crashes, Alleged Securities Violations
entry.summary: The San Francisco-based exchange is facing yet another lawsuit from a disgruntled customer.

entry.title: 'Privacy Is Normal': Rep. Tom Emmer Wants Answers About Tornado Cash Ban
entry.summary: The Treasury’s recent ban on Ethereum mixing service Tornado Cash has a U.S. Representative asking tough questions.

entry.title: How Web3 Can Change Hollywood: Decentralized Pictures CEO
entry.summary: Decentralized Pictures aims to use the wisdom of crowds to fund new projects—and has support from Roman Coppola, Kevin Smith, and Steven Soderbergh.

entry.title: Bitfinex Preps for Merge Eventualities, Offering Ethereum 'Chain Split Tokens'
entry.summary: Bitfinex is courting the possibility of a proof-of-work Ethereum network after the merge and is now offering both ETHW and ETHS tokens.

entry.title: NFT Project SudoRare Disappears With Roughly 520 Ethereum in User Funds
entry.summary: Despite warnings on Crypto Twitter, NFT project SudoRare has disappeared from social media along with more than $800,000 in user funds.

entry.title: Weekly Ethereum Staking Deposits Hit Record Low Just Weeks Before Merge
entry.summary: The number of weekly deposits to Ethereum’s Beacon Chain is at its lowest level ever with just a few more weeks until the merge event.

entry.title: Mark Cuban Slams SEC Chair Gensler's Stance on Crypto
entry.summary: Billionaire investor Mark Cuban took aim at SEC chair Gary Gensler, urging him to publish 'bright line guidelines' for crypto firms to follow.

entry.title: Near’s Rainbow Bridge Blocks Another Attack, Costing Hackers 5 Ethereum
entry.summary: The Rainbow Bridge hack over the weekend saw funds returned in 31 seconds with no harm to users, but the attackers lost 5 Ethereum in the process.

entry.title: Metaverse, NFT Tokens Have Plummeted More Than 20% This Week
entry.summary: Amid a market-wide rout, significant gaming and metaverse tokens are falling harder than most.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is a Node?
entry.summary: In this video, we’ll learn about a core component that defines Web3: blockchain nodes. A node is one of the many computers that power a decentralized network like Ethereum. Learn about the different types of nodes and why they’re part of the core infrastructure that make Web3 possible. Visit Infura.io today to start building. Written by: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.

entry.title: Argentine Presidential Candidate Sued Over Alleged Crypto Ponzi Scheme
entry.summary: Javier Milei once called the central bank a “scam.” Now he’s being sued for allegedly promoting a scam of his own.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Ethereum NFTs Pump 83% As Meta, Nansen Execs Join Advisory Board
entry.summary: The Pudgy Penguins are seeing big gains as the rarest NFT in the collection sold for over $600,000 Monday.

entry.title: ‘Witcher’ Animator Launches DRKVRS Game, NFTs to Bridge Cyberpunk With Horror
entry.summary: The new project with Aleph Zero aims to bring elements of Cyberpunk 2077 into an R-rated cosmic horror experience.

entry.title: Ex-OpenSea Exec Argues NFTs Are Not Securities to Dismiss Insider Trading Charges
entry.summary: The former product manager was in June charged with wire fraud and money laundering. His legal team is now trying to dismiss the case.

entry.title: Telegram CEO Proposes Auctioning Usernames, Links As NFTs
entry.summary: Inspired by the $3 million TON domain sale, he wants to “add a little bit of Web 3.0 to Telegram.”

entry.title: How Ethereum NFT Lending Service BendDAO Aims to Solve Its Liquidity Crisis
entry.summary: The declining NFT market is forcing a lending protocol that leverages them to propose big changes.

entry.title: Invesco Rolls Out New $30 Million Metaverse Fund
entry.summary: The Invesco Metaverse Fund will focus on what the firm calls the “Metaverse Value Chain.”

entry.title: Australia Unveils Plans for Crypto Regulations Unlike 'Anywhere Else in the World'
entry.summary: Crypto regulations will be informed by a phase of comprehensive “token mapping” research, according to Australia’s Treasurer.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange FTX's Revenue Soared 1,000% in 2021: Report
entry.summary: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried confirmed media reports of the exchange’s incredible growth during the 2021 bull market.

entry.title: Meme Coins SHIB, Dogecoin Shed Double-Digits Over The Week
entry.summary: Popular dog-themed meme coins SHIB and Dogecoin have plummeted double-digits over the week as the crypto winter continues.

entry.title: CryptoPunk Ethereum NFTs Floor Price Flips Bored Apes for First Time in 5 Months
entry.summary: The Bored Apes have been sitting pretty all year, but the CryptoPunks may be seeing a second wind.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Tornado Cash Crackdown Crashes Crypto Party, North Korean Hackers Post Fake Coinbase Jobs
entry.summary: Also, Ukraine’s vice prime minister shared the country’s crypto donation balance sheet since the start of the Russian invasion.

entry.title: Decrypt on the Street: An NFT Trip to Tiffany's, a Search for Status
entry.summary: In this episode of Decrypt on the Street, reporter Sander Lutz jumps through hoops in the hopes of obtaining an exclusive "NFTiff" from Tiffany & Co. Sander learns manners and spiritual awareness from two coaches, only to fall short of the digital brass ring.

entry.title: gm: Sam Bankman-Fried, Crypto Savior?
entry.summary: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried is the man of the moment in crypto as he has bailed out multiple insolvent companies. Some are calling him Atlas, some sarcastically calling him savior. Sam answers tough questions from Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on FTX's bailout strategy, the controversial Voyager loan, his market outlook, marketing mistakes by crypto lenders, FTX competitors Binance and Coinbase, his political donations, and what he's learned about management.

entry.title: Why Musician and NFT Artist Jimmy Edgar Remains Skeptical on Music NFTs
entry.summary: Musician and NFT artist Jimmy Edgar is fully sold on NFT art, but not convinced yet on the uses of NFTs in the music world, he told Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Avalanche's John Wu Talks Institutional Interest and Use Cases
entry.summary: Ava Labs President John Wu sits for an extensive chat about institutional interest in crypto and DeFi (it has "absolutely not waned") and use cases of Avalanche with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Avalanche House in Brooklyn on July 15, 2022.

entry.title: Decrypt on the Street: Chipotle Says ‘Buy the Dip!’
entry.summary:
In our latest Decrypt on the Street segment, reporter Sander Lutz investigates Chipotle’s recent crypto marketing campaign and talks to Chipotle customers about their sadness amid the crypto crash.
Sander himself entered the contest hoping to get rich; instead he got a single cup of queso dip.

entry.title: How Civic Is Battling Web3 Bots and Spam: CPO JP Bedoya
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson reports from NFT Expoverse in LA with JP Bedoya, Chief Product Officer at Civic, the Web3 identity verification problem rolling out a new set of tools to keep people from spamming NFT drops to take advantage.

entry.title: gm: Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon is Finding the 'Soul' in Generative Art NFTs
entry.summary: Art Blocks, the generative NFT series, exploded in popularity and price last fall. Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon (aka "Snowfro") talks to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about why the price surge actually hurt Art Blocks and the problem with NFT speculators, the debate over digital art vs. traditional art and his views on Bored Apes and CryptoPunks, how he got into NFTs after starting a physical tile business with his father, and why he thinks everyone's mortgage will eventually be stored on chain.
